summary: Removes scars from Saadia\'s face, from the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Her face should be clean now.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to marry Saadia, but I was a little annoyed with the scars on her face. So I decided to remove them, with a simple mod. 
Her face should be clean now, with no scars. I have tested it with a couple of facelift/makeup mods like CoverWomen v2.0 (for example), and it works just fine.
I think Saadia is really beautiful, but even better without any scars on her face!

Installation:
To install, simply copy/paste everything into your Skyrim directory, like any other re-texture mod. 

Uninstall by removing \"facefemaleleftsidegash_04.dds\" from \\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\facedetails

This mod may or may not remove scars from other female NPCs, IF they have the exact same scars on their face. Right now I havent noticed any other NPCs with the same scars, but if you did, let me know.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To marry her, I used this mod http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2176
author: morpheas768
